channel.title: Softlayer_network_bandwidth_version1_interface on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Interface
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Interface Datatype Description All bandwidth tracking is maintained through the switch that the bandwidth is used through. All bandwidth is stored in a “pod” repository. An interface links the hardware switch with the pod repository identification number. This is only relevant to bandwidth data. It is not common to use this. Local hostId A interface's host. The host stores the pod number for the bandwidth data.
